title: To-Do Application
description:
Developed a full-stack CRUD application for managing daily tasks with authentication and role-based access.
 Implemented RESTful APIs in Spring Boot and secured them with JWT authentication.
 Designed responsive React frontend with React Router and Axios for API integration.

title: BookBite â€“ Online Book Summary Platform
description:
Developed a full-stack web application that allows users to explore and share book summaries.
 Implemented RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express for managing books, summaries, and users.
 Integrated MySQL database for secure and persistent data storage.
 Built a responsive React.js frontend with dynamic routing and Axios for seamless API communication.
 Added user authentication and role-based access for readers and admins.
